name: tckstats
description:
Calculate statistics on streamlines lengths.



References:
author: Robert E. Smith (robert.smith@florey.edu.au)

inputs.name: output
inputs.description: output only the field specified. Multiple such options can be supplied if required. Choices are: mean, median, std, min, max, count. Useful for use in scripts.

type.name: output
type.description: output only the field specified. Multiple such options can be supplied if required. Choices are: mean, median, std, min, max, count. Useful for use in scripts.

inputs.name: field
inputs.description: output only the field specified. Multiple such options can be supplied if required. Choices are: mean, median, std, min, max, count. Useful for use in scripts.

inputs.name: histogram
inputs.description: output a histogram of streamline lengths

inputs.name: dump
inputs.description: dump the streamlines lengths to a text file

inputs.name: ignorezero
inputs.description: do not generate a warning if the track file contains streamlines with zero length

inputs.name: tck_weights_in
inputs.description: specify a text scalar file containing the streamline weights

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.

output-files.name: histogram
output-files.description: output a histogram of streamline lengths

output-files.name: dump
output-files.description: dump the streamlines lengths to a text file
